prospects.name: Jono Hansford
prospects.notes: 552K followers. Runs holiday camps and small group classes. Melbourne-based. Massive reach but may be expensive. Approach with white-label or partnership angle, not small affiliate commission.
prospects.reachoutStrategy: Position as partnership/endorsed tool for his camps. Free Pro + revenue share on referrals from his students.

prospects.name: David Pereyra
prospects.notes: Lead coach at NBA Basketball School Australia. University degree in Physical Education, 10+ years youth program experience. Could be internal champion.
prospects.reachoutStrategy: LinkedIn approach. Position CourtLab as tool for his coaches to track player development. Ask for intro to decision makers.
